head.title: Insight School of Oklahoma | Virtual School in Oklahoma

meta.name: description
meta.content: Insight School of Oklahoma empowers your student to succeed by offering a variety of resources. Learn more about Insight School of Oklahoma today!
Insight School of Oklahoma empowers your student to succeed by offering a variety of resources. Learn more about Insight School of Oklahoma today!

div.span:
Enrollment for the 2020–2021 school year is now open!
Apply today>>

Responding to the Coronavirus:
Learn What You Can Do

#EverySchoolDayCounts – From day 1 until the last day of school, attendance matters!
Go>>

Find college and career options all in one place with Tallo!
Learn more.

img.title: Student with parent

h2.a: Enrollment for the 2020–2021 School Year Is Open

div.p: We'd love to welcome your family to the ISOK community!! Apply today.

img.title: Student with parent

div.p: Celebrating our 5th year as your trusted education provider.

img.alt: Father and son working on homework together
img.title: Father and son working on homework together

div.p: Good attendance helps students do well. Start Strong!

img.title: image of student in class

div.p: Contact one of our Enrollment Consultants. CALL: 877.637.2614

img.title: Photo of girl student reading

div.p: We specialize in helping students catch up and excel in their schooling.

img.title: Photo of students networking

div.p: Network your way to the college and career options you want!

img.title: Teacher webinar

div.p: A panel discussion with teachers from K12-powered schools. Discover more!

Every child has potential. At Insight School of Oklahoma, part of the K¹² network of schools, we work with students and their families in grades 6–12 to help them overcome obstacles with a unique and highly supportive approach.

ul.li: Insight School of Oklahoma offers a comprehensive approach for students of all levels and abilities:
Career Pathways that prepare students for additional technical training or entry into a particular work field
An Individualized Learning Plan (ILP) for each student
A Social and Emotional Learning (SEL) program

div.p: Any parent/legal guardian who is limited in speaking, writing, or reading English may request the school to provide access to services such as interpreter and/or translated documents. To request services please call the ISOK office at 405.835.2133. We will coordinate prompt access for the parent/legal guardian to the appropriate services and/or translator service.

em.br: Families do not pay tuition for a student to attend an online public school. Common household items and office supplies like printer ink and paper are not provided. Our enrollment consultants can help address your technological and computer questions and needs.

div.p: Copyright © 2020 Insight School of Oklahoma. All rights reserved.
